ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
ygData.msgSnippet: Odd...mine started after a patch, went on til I raised cain about it, then was fixed after a GM said it would be. No sound card changes on either side and it s
ygData.messageBody:
Odd...mine started after a patch, went on til I raised cain about it, then was fixed after a GM said it would be. No sound card changes on either side and it's worked fine since. The card in question is an AWE64 gold
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaard, Jeff
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 9:39 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On

I would bet this crashing when she zones is a sound card problem. I would
suggest disable the sound card, start eq and try zoning. If she zones fine
and does not crash, she'll need to buy a better sound card. I had the same
problem, switched sound cards and it was solved.


      -----Original Message-----
      From:      John_Miewald@...
[SMTP:John_Miewald@...]
      Sent:      Friday, May 25, 2001 11:12 AM
      To:      EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
      Subject:      [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On


      I have a friend who is having an unusually difficult time signing on
and
      staying online.  It seems that just about any time she zones, you
can
      assume she will not be on anymore.

      Is this a common problem?  Does anyone have some "quick fix" ideas
that
      might keep her from being punted so easily?

      Thanks for any help.

      "Alazais"


      Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
